chapter.title: High Availability
chapter.para: Several aspects of an OpenStack Networking deployment benefit from high-availabilty to withstand individual node failures. In general, neutron-server and neutron-dhcp-agent can be run in an active-active fashion. The neutron-l3-agent service can be run only as active/passive, to avoid IP conflicts with respect to gateway IP addresses.

section.title: OpenStack Networking High Availability with Pacemaker
section.para: You can run some OpenStack Networking services into a cluster (Active / Passive or Active / Active for OpenStack Networking Server only) with Pacemaker.

Here you can download the latest Resources Agents :
neutron-server: https://github.com/madkiss/openstack-resource-agents
neutron-dhcp-agent : https://github.com/madkiss/openstack-resource-agents
neutron-l3-agent : https://github.com/madkiss/openstack-resource-agents

db:note.db:para: If you need more informations about "How to build a cluster", please refer to Pacemaker documentation.
